name: aog-mcp-server
description: AOG MCP Server - Provides MCP protocol support for AOG (AIPC Open Gateway), enabling AI models to use all AOG AI service capabilities through standardized tool calls.

tools.name: aog_get_services
tools.description: Get all available AI service lists in AOG

tools.name: aog_get_service_providers
tools.description: Get service provider information for specified services

tools.name: aog_get_supported_models
tools.description: Get list of models supported by specified service provider

tools.name: aog_chat
tools.description: Use AOG's chat service for conversations

tools.name: aog_text_to_image
tools.description: Use AOG's text-to-image service to generate images

tools.name: aog_embed
tools.description: Use AOG's embedding service to generate text vector representations

AOG_TIMEOUT.title: Request Timeout
AOG_TIMEOUT.description: Request timeout in milliseconds (default: 2 minutes, suitable for time-consuming services like text-to-image)

requirements.description: Requires AOG service running on the specified base URL

external_services.name: AOG Service
external_services.description: AIPC Open Gateway service must be running and accessible
